attributes.action: Stop sheltering Altaf Hussian & send him back to Pakistan
attributes.additional_details:
May 19, 2013

Countless men, women and children in the Karachi have been murdered, because of `so called` MQM leader Altaf Hussain`s hater speeches, against whom many criminal cases are pending in Pakistan and who is currently operating his party from London.

We the people of the planet earth, must now demand that the United Kingdom, come together with us to STOP these mindless cowards. We want this stopped. We want to see ACTION under Terrorism Act 2006 & Immigration, Asylum and Nationality Act 2006 (revoke his citizenship & send him back to Pakistan), not just hear empty rhetoric.

This signed petition will be sent to the Home Office of United Kingdom. We are calling all people of every nation on this planet to sign this petition for a peaceful world. We are also asking that you forward this petition to everyone you know.
